attributes.action: One law for all no to sharia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sharia law is degrading human rights and women who are suffering from domestic voilence in this country. Sharia law traps them in this cyle of abuse. It solves nothing.

The spread of sharia courts in the uk have trippled in the years. These secret courts let the men get away with basically anything. Women don't have an equal say and nor do the children. Come on Britian wake up say no sharia one law for all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
